synopsis.p: Graphical client program for SND data on fitacf TCP/IP data streams.

description.p: Graphical client program for SND data on fitacf TCP/IP data streams.

The program dumps an ASCII representation of the SND fitacf data stream to standard output. When color mode is enabled, users can toggle between power, velocity, spectral width, and elevation angle by pressing 'p', 'v', w', or 'e', respectively. The 'g' key toggles the ground scatter flag, while the up/down arrow keys adjust the color scale maximum and right/left arrow keys cycle through parameters. Press any other key to exit the program.

example.description: Connect to the host peanut.jhuapl.edu at port 1024 and display the data stream.
